text: Gene E. Snowden (April 7, 1928 – June 10, 2019) was an American politician from the state of Indiana. A Republican, he served in the Indiana House of Representatives and Indiana State Senate in a legislative career spanning from 1964 until his resignation in 1983.https://www.newspapers.com/image/106252794/?terms=Gene+Snowdenhttps://www.huntington.edu/news/gene- snowden-receives-distinguished-service-award/ He was president pro tempore of the Senate from 1979 to 1980.http://www.huntingtoncountytab.com/feature/33966/retirement-not-horizon- service-minded-snowden He served as a Huntington, Indiana City Councilman from 1962 to 1964http://legdb.iga.in.gov/#!/legislator/5901/Gene-Snowden. He was elected County Auditor in 1988 and Mayor in 1992.http://www.huntingtoncountyhonors.org/general/il85hkhr482/Snowden-Gene- He lost reelection as Mayor to Bob Kyle in 1995. It was his first election loss.https://www.newspapers.com/image/313299652/?terms=Gene%2BSnowden%2BMayor%2BBob%2BKyle Gene Snowden died on June 10, 2019. https://www.mcelhaneyhartfuneralhome.com/notices/Gene-Snowden ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the Indiana House of Representatives Category:Indiana state senators
title: Gene Snowden
